text: It’s on! @holly_cummins kicks off the @ljcjug Unconference with “People, Planet, Clouds” https://t.co/K3L9pPpzr5

author.name: Abraham Marín-Pérez
author.description: Technologist, public speaker, consultant, aspiring physicist. Co-author of Continuous Delivery in Java (https://t.co/cKXbRUo8bZ). Opinions are mine.
